name: wwise-zig

releases.name: v2024.1.7-zig0
releases.body:
* Updated to Wwise 2014.1.7
* Removed usage of `usingnamespace` in preparation for Zig 0.15

releases.name: v2023.1.14-zig0
releases.body:
* Migrate to Wwise 2023.1.14
* Remove usage of usingnamespace in preparation for Zig 0.15

releases.name: v2024.1.0-zig0
releases.body:
First release of the 2024.1 version of the binding! 

Use mach-nominated Zig 2024.11.0

releases.name: v2023.1.9-zig0
releases.body:
wwise-zig v2023.1.9-zig0

* Updated to Wwise 2023.1.9
* Updated to mach nominated Zig 2024.11.0

releases.name: v2023.1.1-zig1
releases.body:
* Update to Zig nomiated mach 2024.3.0
* Consider empty Wwise SDK override path to not be valid

releases.name: v2022.1.10-zig1
releases.body:
* Update to Zig nomiated mach 2024.3.0
* Consider empty Wwise SDK override path to not be valid

owner_bio: Cold Bytes Games provide video game programming services. We are also working part-time on our first title: BioMech Catalyst, a 2D pixel art SHMUP in Zig.
